meanings.definition: The presence of air or gas in the pleural cavity, causing collapse of the lung.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with pneumothoraces after the X-ray.
meanings.sent2: Pneumothoraces can be a serious medical condition that requires immediate attention.
meanings.sent3: The party balloon had a pneumothoraces incident, making it deflate suddenly.
meanings.sent4: His dreams of success suffered a pneumothoraces when he faced a major setback.
meanings.sent5: The image of the collapsed lung due to pneumothoraces was etched in his mind.
